frame.name: Exertive_force
frame.definition:
<def-root>An <fen>Entity</fen> is able to exert a <fen>Force</fen> of the <fen>Magnitude</fen> specified by the target.
<ex>Physically, <fex name="Entity">she</fex> <m>is</m> <fex name="Degree">very</fex> <t>strong</t> and uses her strength to benefit her football.</ex>
<ex>Yes, Bronstein had the chance to punish his <t>mighty</t> <fex name="Entity">opponent</fex> for his three-year neglect of work on chess.</ex>
<ex>CCE faces <t>strong</t> <fex name="Action">opposition</fex> from WCA and other groups.</ex></def-root>

FE.name: Entity
FE.definition:
<def-root>The <fen>Entity</fen> which possesses an ability to exert <fen>Force</fen>, whose <fen>Magnitude</fen> is under consideration.
</def-root>

FE.name: Force
FE.definition: <def-root>The feature of an <fen>Entity</fen> which is under discussion.</def-root>

FE.name: Degree
FE.definition: <def-root>A modifier expressing the deviation of the <fen>Magnitude</fen> of <fen>Force</fen> that the <fen>Entity</fen> can exert from the norm or from the value for another <fen>Entity</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Time
FE.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Time</fen> during which the <fen>Entity</fen> is in the state of being able to exert a <fen>Force</fen> of a particular <fen>Magnitude</fen>.</def-root>

FE.name: Circumstances
FE.definition: <def-root>Some specification of the circumstances under which the <fen>Entity</fen> is able to exert a <fen>Force</fen> of the specified <fen>Magnitude</fen> .</def-root>

lexUnit.name: weak.a
lexUnit.definition: FN: not (capable of) exerting great force

lexUnit.name: mighty.a
lexUnit.definition: COD: possessing great power or strength.
